item.title: Bangalore to Lepakshi Solo Trip Plan
item.description: One day trip from Bangalore to Lepakshi, If you are Solo riding on a MotorBike or You are a Family driving in a Car, then this one day plan works very well. Lepakshi is a small village located in Anantapur district, Andhra Pradesh. It is around 120 KM from Bangalore. It is famous for Veerabhadra temple, one of the oldest temples in India. The temple has Ganesha, Nandi, Veerabhadra, Shiva, Bhadrak
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K

item.title: Bangalore to Makalidurga - Trekking
item.description: One-day trek from Bangalore to Makalidurga to Bangalore. If you are a couple riding on a Bike or you are a Family driving in a Car, then this trek plan works very well. Below is the route mentioned where you can plan accordingly. Makalidurga is a hill fort situated 60 km north of Bangalore. item.title: Bangalore to Gandikota (Two Days and One Night, Trip Plan)
item.description: Two Days Trip from Bangalore to Gandikota to Bangalore, If you are a couple riding on a Bike or You are a Family driving in Car, then this two days plan works very well. Below is the route mentioned where you can plan accordingly. A couple of the best places you can visit on the way or around are Lakshmi Narasimha Swamy temple in Kadiri & Belum Caves in Kolimigundla.
